Test for page-break-before:always and page-break-after:always

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


PASS: page number of "firstPage" is 0
FAIL: expected page number of "secondPage1" is 1. Was 0
FAIL: expected page number of "secondPage2" is 1. Was 0
FAIL: expected page number of "thirdPage" is 2. Was 1

PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
